H4672.def: = process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for

H2491.def: = state in which humans or animal are fatally wounded with a sharp object

H5307.def: = process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control

H7704.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

H127.def: = the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3423.def: = process by which humans gain ownership of land and other possessions, which often implies that these possessions will be passed on to the next generation

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H4310.def: = a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

H2205.def: = state in which a human being is nearing the end of a long life

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H4058.def: = action by which humans or deities ascertain the size or quantity of something by comparing it with a standard unit or with an object of known size

H2491.def: = state in which humans or animal are fatally wounded with a sharp object

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H2491.def: = state in which humans or animal are fatally wounded with a sharp object

H5697.def: = female young of a {L:cow<SDBH:פָּרָה>}; ► used as sacrifice

H1241.def: = large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H5923.def: = bar or frame ◄ normally made of wood ► used to join two draft animals at the neck so that they can work together effectively in pulling a plow, threshing board, harrow, or wagon; ≈ often used in a figurative sense to denote oppression

H5647.def: = state in which humans, either as individuals or as groups, are in a position of subservience towards (other) individuals or groups, which is normally accompanied by a number of duties, tasks and obligations

H4900.def: = state in which humans are of more than average height{N:001}

H3381.def: = process by which objects move (involuntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

H2205.def: = state in which a human being is nearing the end of a long life

H5697.def: = female young of a {L:cow<SDBH:פָּרָה>}; ► used as sacrifice

H5158.def: = a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season

H386.def: = state of not being subject to change

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H5647.def: = state in which humans, either as individuals or as groups, are in a position of subservience towards (other) individuals or groups, which is normally accompanied by a number of duties, tasks and obligations

H2232.def: = action by which humans scatter seeds or plant young plants in a field so that they may grow into a new crop; ≈ associated with the concept of investing in order to get a return; also associated with reproduction and perpetuation

H6202.def: literally: to neck; hence: = causative action by which humans kill animals by breaking their neck, which is normally done to unclean animals that, according to the law, cannot be sacrificed

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H3878.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H5066.def: = state in which objects are close to other objects in space

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H977.def: = action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events

H1288.def: = causative action by which humans cause animals to fall on their knees

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H7379.def: = state of opposition or hostility between two or more persons, perhaps even involving a deity

H5061.def: = a disease or sickness or wound ◄ caused by another person or sent from God or a deity ► to punish a person or nation for some wrong or disobedience

H2205.def: = state in which a human being is nearing the end of a long life

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H2491.def: = state in which humans or animal are fatally wounded with a sharp object

H7364.def: = causative action by which humans or animals wash (part of) their own body or someone else's body or another object, usually with water, ► in order to remove any dirt; ≈ the resulting cleanness often symbolizes ritual cleanness, innocence, or even holiness

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H5158.def: = a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season

H5697.def: = female young of a {L:cow<SDBH:פָּרָה>}; ► used as sacrifice

H6202.def: literally: to neck; hence: = causative action by which humans kill animals by breaking their neck, which is normally done to unclean animals that, according to the law, cannot be sacrificed

H6030.def: = action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H8210.def: = causative action by which humans pour out a liquid or dry substance

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H1818.def: = red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of {L:life<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>}; human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H3722.def: = causative action by which humans cover objects with a coating of a certain substance

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H6299.def: = causative action by which humans exchange animals or other humans by substituting them with money or with an(other) animal, ► as a result of which they will escape death or slavery

H5355.def: = state in which humans are not held responsible for actions committed in the past or for future commitments

H1818.def: = red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of {L:life<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>}; human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H7617.def: = a person or group that has been forcibly carried off into slavery or exile

H8389.def: = the shape of (part of) the body of humans and animals; ≈ mostly used in contexts emphasizing the beauty of someone's face and figure

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H7633.def: = a group of people that have been forcibly carried off to prison, into slavery, or exile

H2836.def: = to connect two vertical poles or posts by means of a horizontal rod

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H1548.def: = action by which humans cut the hair on all or part of their body

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H6856.def: = horny covering of the upper surface of the tip of one's finger or toe; ≈ possibly associated with sharpness

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H8071.def: = a long, flowing outer garment reaching to the feet; it was generally a loose-fitting cloth that was draped around the body and held in place in the middle by a sash wrapped around the waist or some means of fastening such as pins or buttons; it was worn at all levels of society, including also priests and other religious leaders; it served more purposes than just an outer covering; women sometimes carried bowls or other implements or grain in its folds; for poorer people it also served as a covering when sleeping

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H3391.def: = period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H1058.def: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H517.def: = direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

H1166.def: = action by which someone exercises authority over other people

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H2654.def: = state in which humans and deities are emotionally attached to (other) humans

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H4376.def: = causative action by which humans hand over objects or privileges in their possession in exchange for goods or money

H3701.def: = silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

H6014.def: = causative action by which someone binds cut grain into sheaves

H1069.def: = process by which a plant produces fruits early in a season; ≈ which are specially regarded and looked after, both because of taste and earliness

H7225.def: = point in time at which an event starts happening

H202.def: = state of being physically strong and healthy which usually includes the ability of producing children

H4941.def: = a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

H1062.def: = state of being the first offspring of a female; ► in the case of humans, the main heir of estate and blessing, a position that, in special cases, could be transferred from one child to the other

H4784.def: = action by which humans reject the authority of a ruler or deity to which they had formerly been subjected

H3372.def: = state in which humans experience fear

H4194.def: = process by which humans or animals stop living

H6086.def: = any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit

H5038.def: = the dead body of humans or animals

H6912.def: = to put the body of someone who died in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, but also with honor and respect

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H7045.def: = actions by which humans or deities consign other humans or deities or inanimate objects to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, fear, anger, or hostility, or because one was paid to do so; ► the effectiveness of a curse partially depends on the authority of the one pronouncing it

H2930.def: = process by which humans, or objects are or become contaminated, ◄ as a result of contagious diseases or conditions, unlawful activities, or contact with what has been contaminated, ► which often results in their inability of being used or participating in social and religious activities, until this state is reversed through prescribed rituals and procedures
